sentences.sContent: Many older companies are revamping their image.
sentences.sCn: 很多老牌公司都在更新公司形象。

sentences.sContent: The revamp includes replacing the old navy uniform with a crisp blue and white cotton outfit.
sentences.sCn: 改进的内容包括将旧海军制服换成清新的蓝白相间的棉套装。

remMethod.val: re(重新) + vamp(修补) → 修订

trans.tranOther: to change something in order to improve it and make it seem more modern
